level.text: Sections 2900 through 2909 govern procedures in cases referred to OAH by the District of Columbia Public Schools (DCPS).
For procedural issues not covered in Sections 2900 through 2909, the rules in Chapter 28 apply.
OAH is not required to follow any other procedural rules adopted by DCPS in cases referred to OAH by DCPS.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 11122 (December 23, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 3128 (April 20, 2012).
